activities.name: Copy Quantum SYS_COMPANIES Table to Staging

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT GEO_AUTO_KEY
, GEO_CODE
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_GEO_001
FROM TESTENV.GEO_CODES

SELECT COC_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, COUNTRY_NAME
FROM TESTENV.COUNTRY_CODES

dependsOn.activity: Copy Quantum SYS_COMPANIES Table to Staging

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT DIV_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, SDF_DIV_001
, DIVISION_NAME
FROM TESTENV.DIVISION

SELECT GLS_AUTO_KEY
, SEGMENT_NUMBER
, ACCOUNT
, DESCRIPTION
, ACCOUNT_TYPE
, ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC
, SDF_GLS_002
FROM TESTENV.GL_SEGMENT

SELECT GAC_AUTO_KEY
, GAC_PARENT
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, ACCOUNT_TYPE
, SEQ
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_GAC_001
, COSTOFGOODS_FLAG
, OTHER_INCOME_FLAG
, OTHER_EXPENSE_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.GL_ACCT_CAT

SELECT DPT_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, DIV_AUTO_KEY
, GLS_AUTO_KEY
, DEPT_NAME
, SDF_DPT_001
FROM TESTENV.DEPARTMENT

SELECT WOK_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_WOK_003
, SDF_WOK_001
, SDF_WOK_002
, BILLING_RATE
FROM TESTENV.WO_SKILLS

SELECT GLA_AUTO_KEY
, ACCOUNT_NUMBER
, ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, GAC_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
, GLS_AUTO_KEY0
, GLS_AUTO_KEY1
, GLS_AUTO_KEY2
, GLS_AUTO_KEY3
, GLS_AUTO_KEY4
, LEDGER
, SEQ
, BUDGETED
, COSTOFGOODS_FLAG
, ALLOW_ENTRY
, REPLACEABLE
, OTHER_INCOME_FLAG
, OTHER_EXPENSE_FLAG
, CONTROL_ACCOUNT_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.GL_ACCOUNT

SELECT GLJ_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_JOURNAL

SELECT GLD_AUTO_KEY
, GLJ_AUTO_KEY
, GLA_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_DISTRIBUTION

SELECT GLF_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_FISCAL

SELECT GLP_AUTO_KEY
, GLF_AUTO_KEY
, FISCAL_START
, FISCAL_END
, GLP_FORWARD
, GLP_LAST
, IS_ACTIVE
, BUDGET_PERIOD
, FYE_PERIOD
FROM TESTENV.GL_PERIOD

SELECT CMP_AUTO_KEY
, COMPANY_CODE
, COMPANY_NAME
, COMPANY_ABBREV
, ADDRESS1
, ADDRESS2
, ADDRESS3
, CITY
, STATE
, ZIP_CODE
, COUNTRY
, SHIP_ADDRESS1
, SHIP_ADDRESS2
, SHIP_ADDRESS3
, SHIP_CITY
, SHIP_STATE
, SHIP_ZIP_CODE
, SHIP_COUNTRY
, SITE_CODE
, PHONE_NUMBER
, ALT_PHONE_NUMBER
, CUSTOMER_FLAG
, VENDOR_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.COMPANIES
